Reviews.Title: Slow and crashy.
Reviews.Author: WindFishTokes
Reviews.Content: The first one I bought crashed twice within the first three hours of use. It was also extremely slow. I believed it to be a defect and took it back.The second one was also slow, no matter how many useless apps and updates I did to it. Finally the next morning with it, the computer completely seized going from the app screen to the desktop.Worst experience of my life.Electronic-wise anyway.

Reviews.Title: good for what it costs
Reviews.Author: M. Athar
Reviews.Content: Honestly, you're probably better off with a tablet; but this can compile code, which I need.You won't be running crysis, or probably even minecraft.But it can run word, excel, firefox, matlab, etc.BUT even on a blazing fast internet connection, it can't stream HD video on netflix (not enough resources to run that much data through silverlight, i guess)

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: excellent laptop it's easy to use and move wherever a go. It is fast  and i like that i don't need mouse, because its tactil. thank you

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: althea
Reviews.Content: I love this notebook it's perfect for what I need  I'm going to an online school  The Microsoft office works great
